ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/99 7:13:12 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
lachdanan@... writes:

> From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>
> I find that I must do my own Necro research. I am L16, Gnome. Could
> someone share the basic approach to research wirh me?
Collect lots of words :) and then try research! :)
You also need to learn languages.
The first book is written in either Elder Tier'Dal (Kobold) Or Old Erudian
Second Book is in Combine
Third Book is in Dragon
Fourth Book is in Elder Dragon

> I know of one site
> (URL) that has information on what words make what spell. Would anyone
> share any others?
Only know of the one.

> I have access to lots of words. I think I spend 1
> training point in research (all that is permitted) , buy some book or
> container, put words in it, and do some kind of action to make a spell. If
> it fails ( and I imagine they all do) words are gone?
There is the book that the "combining" is done in. Then there are 4 books
with spell components in them. Each in a different language. You will want
to buy these (Or cheat and get the lists at the research site...)

You will have a list of 2 to 4 components that you put in the research book,
then click combine. If you succeed, you get a spell.

> How do you store
> same words (stackable like fish) ?
Many words are stackable. Some are not. Some words come in both stackable
and non-stackable. It does not seem to make a difference which you use when
making a spell.

> Where are best places, and mobs, to get
> words?
I seem to find a lot on Aviaks. BUT... you can find them on ANY level 16 or
higher mob, with a higher chance to find on casters. You MAY find on some
lower level mobs, but the chances are much higher on 16 and higher.

> Do I have to be successful at making L1-L15 spells before I have a
> hope of making L16 ones?
It only starts at level 16 spells :)

> Can I make L24 spells before I am L24?
You can, but your chances are not necessarily good.

>
> I need Restless Bones, Feign Death, and Aura Banshee. Some say at least
> the 1st and 3d can be bought from vendors but I have no idea where? Is L16
> way to low to make L16 spells?

Banshee aura is no longer available at a vendor (not that I know of at least)
It used to be at the troll shadowknight vender, but is no longer. The level
16, 20, and 24 pet area available at the Troll Shadownight vendor in their
home city.
>
